spec_data.Name: python-libturpial
spec_data.Description:
libturpial is a library that handles multiple micro blogging protocols. It
implements a lot of features and aims to support all the features for each
protocol. This library is the back-end used for Turpial.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Sat 29 Jul 2017 01:48:50 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Micro blogging python library, needed for turpial (twitter client)
